mapper.insert: INSERT INTO process_employ_interview(code, classcode, datetimee, corporiation,position,type,salary,result,realSalary,fuli) VALUES(#{code},#{classcode}, #{datetimee},#{corporiation}, #{position},#{type},#{salary},#{result},#{realSalary},#{fuli})
mapper.select: SELECT br.code code, br.trname name, br.gender gender,br.classcode classcode,br.diploma diploma, br.graducateTime graducateTime,br.profession profession,br.graduateSchool graduateSchool, pei.peiid peiid, pei.datetimee datetimee, pei.corporiation corporiation, pei.position position, pei.type type, pei.salary salary, pei.result result, pei.realSalary realSalary, pei.fuli fuli,pei.employProof employProof FROM baseinfo_trainee br, process_employ_interview pei WHERE pei.classcode=#{arg0} AND br.code=pei.code
mapper.update: UPDATE process_employ_interview SET datetimee=#{datetimee}, entertimee=#{entertimee}, corporiation=#{corporiation}, position=#{position}, type=#{type}, salary=#{salary}, result=#{result}, realSalary=#{realSalary}, fuli=#{fuli}, employProof=#{employProof} WHERE peiid=#{peiid}
